## jsx.withImgAttrs() function

Returns a function that generates HTML attributes for an `<img>` tag.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function withImgAttrs(options: ImgAttrsOptions): (yoot: Yoot, overrideOptions?: ImgAttrsOptions) => ImgAttrs;
```

Description

options

</td><td>

[ImgAttrsOptions](./yoot.jsx.imgattrsoptions.md)

</td><td>

`<img>` attributes and optional `srcSetBuilder`<!-- -->.

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

(yoot: [Yoot](./yoot.yoot.md)<!-- -->, overrideOptions?: [ImgAttrsOptions](./yoot.jsx.imgattrsoptions.md)<!-- -->) =&gt; <span style="opacity:0.7;font-style:italic">ImgAttrs</span>

A function that accepts a `Yoot` object and returns HTML `<img>` attributes.

## Remarks

Merges provided attributes with derived ones. Supports fallback for `alt`<!-- -->.
